bug.author: barambani
bug.summary: Source input in the Artifact's tab of the pipeline runs is GCS specific
bug.description:
/kind bug
The source input in the Artifact's tab of the pipeline runs is GCS specific (see image) <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/201339/69741259-a73c3800-1132-11ea-9ca2-a03b9f07efca.jpg></denchmark-link>
What did you expect to happen: I deploy kubeflow to AWS EKS and I would expect to allow also artifacts stored in S3 Environment:
Kubeflow version: (version number can be found at the bottom left corner of the Kubeflow dashboard): 0.7.0 Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube): AWS EKS Kubernetes version: (use kubectl version):
<denchmark-code>clientVersion: buildDate: "2019-11-14T04:24:34Z" compiler: gc gitCommit: b3cbbae08ec52a7fc73d334838e18d17e8512749 gitTreeState: clean gitVersion: v1.16.3 goVersion: go1.12.13 major: "1" minor: "16" platform: darwin/amd64 serverVersion: buildDate: "2019-11-25T00:55:38Z" compiler: gc gitCommit: b8860f6c40640897e52c143f1b9f011a503d6e46 gitTreeState: clean gitVersion: v1.14.8-eks-b8860f goVersion: go1.12.10 major: "1" minor: 14+ platform: linux/amd64 </denchmark-code>
